name: Yeon
description: The payment method used in the metaverse is not the same as the point system used in one website or points (or penalty point) used in one school. As currencies used in various countries and organizations are used within the metaverse platform, their value is bound to change. The core purpose of the YEON token is to convert this into a single payment method. The YEON token is the core value within the metaverse platform.
